text:
30 December 1952
Mr. Jim Idles
HASS
119 Gregory Hall
Urbane, Illinois
Dear Jims
In regard to your letter on the Carl Sandburg 75th
birthday anniversary, I have talked to George Jennings
and he awl his engineers will take ears of this
natter, He has the staff and can make the recordings
for the 1UE3, and will be glad to do it.
It Is an excellent suggestion.
Best regards.
George 1, Probet
GEPiPW
eoi
Norbert J. Hruby
Seymour Siegel .
Prank Schooley k
